contentList.content: Recognizing that your hand has trembled, at the last moment you try to adjust the direction of the shot to account for inertia. Deal [2] less damage, but gain +[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack roll</LSTag>.

Your ranged weapon attacks do not receive penalties from High Ground Rules.

Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -[1] penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional [2] damage. On miss, you will be able to negate Attack Roll penalty with damage reduced by [2].

Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with have a -[1] penalty to their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, but deal an additional [2] damage. On miss, you will be able to negate <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty with damage reduced by [2].
